# machete ⲙⲁⲭⲉⲣⲁ μάχαιρα mákhaira Messer maSchere macut machada (axe) ⇔ Metz

𓌳 sickle

𓌷 machete
𓌂 𓅓 𓏏 𓏥 Macht (power) ⇔ mace 𓍛
𓄫 μῆκος mêkos measure machete 𓄫 𓅱 𓏏 𓌪 (long-knife) Messer
𓌰 𓅓 𓋴 ⇔ machete 𓌰 𓅓 𓋴 𓀙 amīcōs amigo ⇔ Mücke
𓌱 #Maten 𓌪 #Maten : 𓉎 twenty-second nome Mednit/ Medenit 𓉎/𓉏 (Maten) "Knife" Hathor

𓅓 𓈙 𓂝 𓅱 𓈔 𓏤 | machete | μάχαιρα mákhaira ⲙⲁⲭⲉⲣⲁ 𐌼𐌴𐌺𐌴𐌹𐍃 mēkeis (sword ξιφο)
𓅓 𓈙 𓂝 𓏏 𓈎 𓍜 | (shoulder) blade | ma.shoulder 𓈙 𓂝 𓏏 𓍜 > نصلة ᵐnaṣla

𓂧 𓅓 𓏏 𓌪 𓏤 | knife | កាំបិត kambət ⇔ wetzen ⇔ gavit 𓋴 𓆑 𓏏 𓌪 knife
𓂧 𓅓 𓏏 𓌪 𓏤 | knife | Damastkus de'Mether das Messer 𐌼𐌰𐌹𐍄𐌰𐌽 mātre مُدْيَة mudya! ⇔ sharp (≠dumb)

𓂧 𓅓 𓏏 𓌪 𓏤 | knife | ϭⲟⲣⲧⲉ corte cortial cortèƚo > छुरी churī cultellus cultedda cultella ⇔ cuttlery ಕತ್ತಿ katti cut

𓂧 𓅁 𓌪 𓂡 | cut off (heads) | ⇔ smite

𓋴 𓆑 𓏏 𓌪 | •blade | شَفْرَة šafra™ sayr շեղբ šełb ⇔ sharp™ Sebel čepel chop'd

𓊃 𓆑 𓏏 𓌪 | sword | ⲥⲏϥⲉ

𓋴 𓆑 𓏏 𓌪 | knife | •sabit ⇔ •chambət : 𓂧 𓅓 𓏏 𓌪 𓏤 កាំបិត kambət ⇔ combat
𓋴 𓆑 𓏏 𓌪 | knife | •sabit savik@Norse
Bohairic: ⲥⲏϥⲓ f (sēfi) סַיִף sáyif sword < sputa spatha σπάθη spáthē σπαθί spathí ⇔ Spalt @ Sparta
Sahidic: ⲥⲏϥⲉ f (sēfe) sword < סיפא / ܣܝܦܐ (saypā), Arabic سَيْف (sayf),
Safaitic 𐪊𐪐 (s¹f /sayp/), Amharic ሰይፍ (säyf), Ancient Greek ξίφος (xíphos) saber
French sabre, from German Säbel, from Polish szabla, from Hungarian szablya. Cognate with Danish sabel, Russian са́бля (sáblja), Serbo-Croatian сабља. *sele “iron”.[2] Compare Mongolian сэлэм (selem)
ша́бля f (šáblja) са́бя (bg) f (sábja)
सेबर m (sebar)
sveðja
ша́бля (uk) f (šáblja), ша́шка f (šáška)
Italian: sciabola (it) f
Japanese: サーベル (sāberu)
Korean: 사브르 (sabeureu)
σφάζω spházō, “to slay, to kill”

⇔ German *spadô, Hittite išpatar, “spear” spear
